TextBased/Lib/WinnerExtensions.cs
1 
9 using ColorShapeLinks.Common;
10 
11 namespace ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.Lib
12 {
14  public static class WinnerExtensions
15  {
24  public static ExitStatus ToExitStatus(this Winner winner)
25  {
26  // The exit status
27  ExitStatus exitStatus;
28 
29  // Find an exit status compatible with the match winner
30  switch (winner)
31  {
32  case Winner.Draw:
33  exitStatus = ExitStatus.Draw;
34  break;
35  case Winner.White:
36  exitStatus = ExitStatus.WhiteWins;
37  break;
38  case Winner.Red:
39  exitStatus = ExitStatus.RedWins;
40  break;
41  default:
42  exitStatus= ExitStatus.Exception;
43  break;
44  }
45 
46  return exitStatus;
47  }
48  }
49 }
